tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceMonitoring (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  standard_compliance VARCHAR(255),
  certification_status BOOLEAN,
  last_inspection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CertificationStatus (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    certification_body VARCHAR(100),
    expiry_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE company_compliance (
    id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR(50),
    standard_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE standards (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE certifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  issuing_authority VARCHAR(100),
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_id INT,
  certification_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES standards(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(id)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  compliance_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (compliance_id) REFERENCES compliance(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(255),
    violation_description TEXT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(50),
    violation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_type VARCHAR(255),
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50)
);
